subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “who”
: Cognate with {{och-l|誰|who}}, {{och-l|孰|which one; who}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). In other {{cog|sit}} languages, compare {{cog|lus|tû||who; which}}, {{cog|cdm|दोह्‌||what}}, {{cog|tbq-kuk-pro|*tuu||who; which (relativizer)}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}; STEDT).
